questions.question: A group of market women sell at least one of yam, plantain and maize. Twelve of them sell maize, ten sell yam and fourteen sell plantain. Five sell plantain and maize, four sell yam and maize, two sell yam and plantain only while three sell all the three items. How many women are in the group?
The first term of a geometric progression is twice its common ratio. Find the sum of the first two terms of the G.P if its sum to infinity is 8.
What is the area of a square with side length 5?
If a = 3 and b = 7, what is a + b?

options: She will go to the store.
She is going to the store.

questions.question: What is the SI unit of force?
Define the term 'acceleration.'
options: The force applied to an object
The rate of change of velocity
The distance traveled by an object
questions.correctAnswer: The rate of change of velocity

questions.question: What is the formula for calculating work?

What is the law of conservation of energy?
options: Energy can be created but not destroyed
Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed
questions.correctAnswer: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed
